title: Probing Local Strain and Orientation in Layered Materials using 4D-STEM Moiré Analysis
content: Moiré lattices have gained a lot of attention in recent years as they offer a promising way to dramatically alter materials properties. For instance, bilayer graphene can be made superconductive by twisting the layers by a specific angle [1]. The optical properties of 2D materials can be tuned in the same way [2].
